msbt.message: It's real neat that your birthday happens every year. It happened THIS year, and it'll happen next year, and the year after that, and the year after that... Man. I gotta put all this on my calendar.
Hearing "Happy birthday!" a bunch on your birthday is good luck. Happybirthdayhappybirthdayhappy birthdayhappybirthdayhappybirthd ayhappybirthdayhappybirthdayhapp ybirthdayhappybirthdayhappybirthd

When it's birthday time that means it's cake time. And cake time is when I smush my face in the cake and eat it all as fast as I can. I get yelled at, but I can't hear it 'cause of all the icing in my ears. Win-win.
Happy birthday! I gotta tell you, whenever I see your ultra delts and mega biceps, I get SUPER pumped to up my game. My giant muscles wouldn't be what they are without you to inspire them. Thanks!

Happy birthday! Meeting you totally changed my life. My muscles got bigger, my lap times got shorter, my bench weight heavier... What I'm saying is, you're the best. Now have yourself a birthday FLEX!

Happy birthday! Did your muscles get...musclier this year? 'Cause seriously, I am in awe. And I can't wait to see what the next year's got in store. This flex is for you... OK, I just flexed and it was great.
Surprised to be gettin' a message from me? Dunno why you would be. This is your big day, and there's no better time for your pals to check in and tell you how great you are! Here's to you, !

Havin' a good day? Must feel neat knowin' there's a concert bein' put on in your honor today! In case you didn't know it already, folks around here care about you and are glad you're here on our island with us.

I should be tellin' you this to your face instead of writin', but I just gotta say I'm proud to be your pal. I sure am glad we have a day just for celebratin' you, 'cause you're the best and you deserve the best.
I'm so excited to celebrate your birthday this year that it almost feels like it's MY birthday! Don't worry—I'm not expecting any gifts. Seriously, though...have the best birthday ever, !
Happy Birthday! Another year older, another year awesomer. Getting to know you has been super fun, and I can't wait for another year of it! I hope you do something extra special today.
Congratulations on completing another trip around that giant fireball in the sky! I'm so grateful for all the memories we've made together, ... Please excuse the tear stains.

Here's hoping your birthday is full of laughter. I can't think of anyone more deserving of an awesome day. I can say that your smile always cheers me up, and that you make life here better for everyone!

Happy birthday to you with all my heart! I hope you know how much you mean to everyone here. You've been like a gift to our community, and you bring so much joy into our lives every day, just by being you!

Happy birthday! I'm so glad you're in my life so we can share good times on this island together. I hope it's been just as fun for you. My wish for you is that your coming year is full of laughs and smiles.
This year it's K.K. serenading you on your birthday. Someday he'll be my opening act when I serenade you on your birthday. I'm so happy you're looking forward to it as much as I am!

Do something crazy, like skydiving! I did that on my b-day one year. Took a class, suited up, and jumped out of a plane! I have no idea what I was thinking! I screamed all the way down and an hour after that!
You're not just my BFF, you're my CBHBFFAEY too! That means, "My Coolest Birthday-Having Best Friend Forever and Ever, YAY!" You're the only CBHBFFAEY that I have, so I'm pretty lucky!
I confess, I am full of emotions on your birthday. It's just... I'm so very grateful for you! You are fabulous beyond words, and I wish you every happiness in the world.
Happiest of birthdays! Please know that I am going to work hard to make this another wonderful year for you. I do hope you'll continue to grace me with your friendship. It means the world to me!

Happy birthday! It has been such a delight watching you be the very best you this past year. Keep up the good work! May our friendship continue to grow so I can wish you a happy birthday year after year!
Happy birthday! How you feelin'? Stronger? More agile? Maybe a bit wiser? Well, guess what—you're all of the above! So here's to great stats, and another year of you bein' your fearless self. Go you!
OK, this is kinda embarrassin' to say, but every day I get even more stoked to be on this island with you. So happy birthday, and thanks for being you. wouldn't be the same without you.

I hope this day finds you well on your joyous birthday... No, I can't do all this fancy-talk stuff. So yeah, HAPPY B-DAY! Thanks for bein' my pal. It means a lot. I can't wait to see the mischief we get into next!
Just wanted to say Happy Birthday! I hope the year is full of wonderful things for you, . I may need to lean on you from time to time, but I hope we'll be friends for all the years to come!
Happy Birthday! I don't say it enough, but, , you are such an important part of . Yes, yes! You make sure that this coming year is truly a great one!
Happy Birthday! You're always helping us in so many ways. I hope you'll continue to shop at Nook's Cranny and stop in to say hi to me and my brother every so often. We'll be waiting!
Happy Birthday! Did you know that every day my brother and I look forward to seeing you in the shop? You always seem so busy to me, but I hope you remember to take a break every now and then.

A little bird told me that today is the anniversary of your birth, a most felicitous event that warrants the greatest of celebrations! I hope the day brings you the same joy you so often bring to others.
I heard today is your birthday! Congratulations and happy birthday and all that! I hope your day is super fun, and please stop by the shop soon—we'd love to see you!

I don't usually write letters, so please forgive me if I sound a bit stiff. I wanted to wish you a very happy birthday. I hope you find the time to reflect on the year you've just finished and what lies ahead.
I wish I could celebrate with you today, but at least I can take advantage of our state-of-the-art Dodo Airlines postal services to wish you a happy birthday! Dodo Airlines: When Waddling Won't Do.
Heard time just put a +1 on your payload—congrats! This is your friendly reminder to enjoy some R&R today, and be sure to wear your sandals out before you blow those candles out!
